overview: Foad is a former Jupiter Research analyst (now Forrester Research) and founder of the ICT practice for Frost & Sullivan in Australia. He is one of the few people in Australia to be employed in the social networking industry having held the role of Marketing & Research Director for Friendster. Foad experience crosses over into media where he spent time as Technology Editor for BRW magazine (Australiaâ€™s leading weekly business magazine) and earlier as Managing Editor for Jupitermedia (Internet industry news site). He is a strong public speaker and has presented at over 50 events including Adtech, Cebit and Search engine strategies. Most recently Foad authored Digital Nation, a graphical book providing insights into consumer technology adoption in Australia.
